search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Better Stack (better-stack.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Better Stack can be found at: [https://betterstack.com/pricing/](https://betterstack.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Users
-----

Incident resolution is a multi-player game. Invite your team and investigate & resolve incidents faster.

Unlimited team members

Free access to [Telemetry](https://betterstack.com/telemetry).

$0

per member per month

Responder

Access to [Uptime](https://betterstack.com/uptime) with incident management, on-call, monitoring and status pages with unlimited phone call and SMS alerts.

$34

$29

per license per month

Monitoring
----------

* * *

### Monitors

The most advanced external monitoring that checks any URL, IP address, and port. Whether it's your landing page, monolith application, SPA, REST API, or a bare metal server, you can monitor everything.

Monitors

10 monitors included

Additional 50 monitors

$25 per month

$21 per month

### Reporting & analytics

Reporting & analytics

Incident management
-------------------

* * *

### On-call & incident management

On-call scheduling & alerting is built-in. Set up duties, get flexible alerting options, and resolve incidents collaboratively.

On-call scheduling for responders

included

Get your team a good night sleep. Machine learning powered incident silencing automatically snoozes irrelevant incidents, reduces noise, prevents alert fatigue, and improves the team performance.

500 silenced incidents

Basic single-channel integration

included

### Payment

We make the process simple for your legal, finance, and procurement teams.

#### Enterprise-ready

Find out why the best teams rely on Better Stack.

Starts at $29 per month. All plans come with a 60-day money-back guarantee. Get started in 2 minutes.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes various subscription tiers and usage-based options for additional features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Unlimited team members with free access to Telemetry.
Access to Uptime with incident management and monitoring.
features: Unlimited phone call and SMS alerts

additional_fees.fee_description: Per page per month for custom styling.
Per page per month to remove branding.
